smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'TwitterOAuthActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function gotShowStatus appears to be too complex.
The function setEntry appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function setEntry is nested too deeply.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: findViewById(R.id.quality_tab_strip) cannot be safely cast to PagerTabStrip.
findViewById(R.id.quality_pager) cannot be safely cast to ViewPager.
view.findViewById(R.id.about_version) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
view.findViewById(R.id.accounts_spinner) cannot be safely cast to Spinner.
getDialog().findViewById(R.id.spinner_edit) cannot be safely cast to EditText.
listView.getItemAtPosition(position) cannot be safely cast to Cursor.
listView.getItemAtPosition(it) cannot be safely cast to Cursor.
LayoutInflater.from(this@TwitterDisplay).inflate(R.layout.tweets_list_view, mTweetBaseLayout, false) cannot be safely cast to ListView.
context.getSystemService(Context.CLIPBOARD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to ClipboardManager.
LayoutInflater.from(urlLayout.context).inflate(R.layout.twitter_url, urlLayout, false) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
findViewById(R.id.loading_imageview) cannot be safely cast to ImageView.
findViewById(R.id.web_view) cannot be safely cast to WebView.
context.getSystemService(Context.LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to LayoutInflater.
view.findViewById(R.id.screen) cannot be safely cast to CheckedTextView.
view.findViewById(R.id.icon) cannot be safely cast to ImageView.
(convertView ?: inflater.inflate(R.layout.loading_layout, parent, false)) cannot be safely cast to UserTweetLoadingView.
(convertView ?: inflater.inflate(R.layout.twitter_status_list, parent, false)) cannot be safely cast to UserTweetView.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

net.nonylene.photolinkviewer.tool.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
net.nonylene.photolinkviewer.tool.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
twitter4j.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function onCreate has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of TwitterDisplay.

smells.name: RedundantVisibilityModifierRule
smells.description: Checks for redundant visibility modifiers. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

instances.message: LoadingViewListener is explicitly marked as public. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.
loadingViewListener is explicitly marked as public. Properties are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
setIsRequesting is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class AccountsList defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
